item.title: US-76 East - Chattooga River
item.description: Chattooga River on US-76 east. The Chattooga River is the boundary between Georgia and South Carolina.

item.title: US-76 East - South Carolina
item.description: South Carolina State Line on US-76 east. Taken at the Georgia/South Carolina border.

item.title: US-23/US-441/GA-15 South/US-76/GA-2 East at US-76/GA-2 Split
item.description: US-23/US-441/GA-15 South/US-76/GA-2 East at US-76/GA-2 Split in Clayton. Turn left for US-76/GA-2 East to Westminster (SC); continue south on US-441/US-23/GA-15 to Clarkesville.

item.title: US-76/GA-2 East at US-23/US-441/GA-15 - Clayton
item.description: US-76/GA-2 East at US-23/US-441/GA-15 in Clayton. US-76/GA-2 East joins US-23/US-441/GA-15 South through Clayton.

item.title: US-76/GA-2 East Approaching US-23/US-441/GA-15
item.description: US-76/GA-2 East Approaching US-23/US-441/GA-15 in Clayton. Use US-23/US-441/GA-15 north for Dillard and Franklin (NC). Use US-23/US-441/GA-15 South/US-76/GA-2 East to Tallulah Falls and Westminster (SC).

item.title: US-76 East/GA-2 East - Towns County
item.description: US-76 East/GA-2 East in Towns County
